text: save the childrens is our social duty
Why do you say that?
because the children wills death due to non parents
I have my own children to worry about.
oh okk but isay generally
We have no responsibility.  Whatever is done is done out of kindness, not obligation.
yes you are right. but we have to donate for save the childrens
No, we really don't have to at all.  Most charities are scams anyway.
but not all charitys are scams
I am not willing to risk my money to test them.
but you will spend your money in unwanted like trips,snacks etc....
You don't know me well enough to assume that now do you?  I lead a very simple life.
its ok and you will tell this some friends who are in high class to donate for the childrens
No, I really wouldn't lead anyone to have their money taken.
what a pesimist you are
No, it's called being a Realist...
it's not realistic its called as fear of everything
It's not fear.  It's common sense.  I think it's very silly to give your money away.
its not very sily its says to be humanity. are you a human or not
I am very human.  I prefer to donate to my own kids.
